articles.description: Chinese smartphone and appliance maker Xiaomi announced late Thursday a new operating system — as it plans to release its own car.
articles.content:
The Xiaomi HyperOS logo is displayed on a smartphone.
BEIJING Chinese smartphone and appliance maker Xiaomi announced late Thursday a new operating system as it seeks to develop its ecosystem with t… [+2551 chars]
